object.name: hyprlauncher_core_manager
object.description: This is the core manager object for hyprlauncher operations

c2s.name: set_open_state
c2s.description: Sets the open state of the launcher. 0 - toggle 1 - open 2 - close

c2s.name: open_with_options
c2s.description: Opens the launcher with given options. If the launcher is already open, this is a no-op.

c2s.name: get_info_object
c2s.description: Gets the launcher info object. That object will return some data about the launcher's state

c2s.name: destroy
c2s.description: Destroys this object. Children remain alive until destroyed.

object.name: hyprlauncher_core_info
object.description: Info object, will emit various information about the state of the launcher

s2c.name: open_state
s2c.description: Emitted on creation of this object, and when the state changes.

s2c.name: selection_made
s2c.description: Emitted on selection by the user. The launcher will close immediately after this is emitted.

c2s.name: destroy
c2s.description: Destroys this object. Children remain alive until destroyed.
